channel.title: CVE Feed for IPCOMM -- IPCOMM ipDIO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IPCOMM -- IPCOMM ipDIO

item.title: CVE-2022-21146|2024-08-03T02:31:59.864Z -- ipcomm -- ipcomm%20ipdio
item.description: Persistent cross-site scripting in the web interface of ipDIO allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to introduce arbitrary JavaScript by injecting an XSS payload into a specific parameter. The XSS payload will be executed when a legitimate user attempts to review history.
